name: Czarna Wołga
description:
Game made by:
- Joanna Smolińska (Graphics)
- Daniel Kunicki (Programming)
for Palace Game Jam (30.06 - 02.07 2017).

The jam subject was: "The legend". Czarna Wołga is a game about an urban legend of the Black Wolga car, that was believed to kidnap children wandering on the streets of cities of communist Peaople Republic of Poland back in 60s and 70s.
